task.title: Edit Standard Reports Access Rights
task.shortdesc: Edit the view access rights to UltiPro Standard Reports for employees assigned to a selected role on the Standard Reports Access Rights page.

context.p: Initially, all report categories are collapsed and the associated access rights are disabled. Access rights can be assigned to an entire report category (and inherited by all titles within the category) or assigned individually to selected report titles within a category. When selected report titles have different access rights than others in the same category, the corresponding rights for the high-level category are shown to be partially enabled.
Access rights for standard reports categories/titles are indicated with icons on the Standard Reports Access Rights page:

ul.li: Green check marks indicate rights that are enabled.
Unchecked boxes indicate rights that are disabled.
Checkboxes with yellow tick marks indicate rights that are partially enabled.

step.cmd: From the Standard Reports Access Rights page, expand the reports (categories) to view the current access rights settings for the associated standard report titles.
Assign access rights to each standard report category/title:

ul.li: Check the View box to enable viewing rights.
Uncheck any box to disable the assigned access rights.

step.cmd: Select the Description / Role Types, Web Access Rights, or Business Rules Access Rights tab to add or change other role information, as desired.

note.p: The Standard Reports Access Rights and Business Rules Access Rights tabs only appear if an appropriate role type is selected on the Description / Role Types page.

step.cmd: Select Save. The Role Administration page appears.

link.linktext: Add or Change Role Information and Role Types
